description:
11.172 multiply
Multiply first video stream pixels values with second video stream pixels values.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: multiply

options.description: Set the scale applied to second video stream. By default is 1. Allowed range is from 0 to 9.
options.name: scale

options.description: Set the offset applied to second video stream. By default is 0.5. Allowed range is from -1 to 1.
options.name: offset

options.description: Specify planes from input video stream that will be processed. By default all planes are processed.
options.name: planes
